mapper.select: select id,POST_CODE AS postCode,POST_NAME AS postName from mp_post
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_code = #{postCode}
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_name = #{postName}

with ages as ( select TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR ,BIRTHDAY, now()) AS years from mp_post p, mp_userpost up , mp_staff s where p.id = up.POST_ID and s.user_id = up.USER_ID and up.USER_ID = s.user_id and s.STAFF_SCOPE = '1' and p.id = #{postId} ) select sum( case when years < 20 then 1 else 0 end) as little , sum( case when years < 30 and years >= 20 then 1 else 0 end) as youth, sum( case when years < 40 and years >= 30 then 1 else 0 end) as middle, sum( case when years > 40 then 1 else 0 end) as agedness from ages
